project.name: C-C089A-CTRE-01-ST04-DT02-DF11-CF20-01
project.description: Creating test case using base program. Added an environment variable read to get a key in order to read in data from shared memory. Completed injection.

build_commands.command: make install CC="$SS_CC" LD="$SS_LNK" CFLAGS="$CFLAGS" CPPFLAGS="$CPPFLAGS" LDFLAGS="$LDFLAGS" prefix="$SS_TC_ROOT/$SS_TC_INSTALL" LIBS="$LIBS"

iopair.name: C-C089A-CTRE-01-ST04-DT02-DF11-CF20-01-GOOD-01
iopair.description: Good inputs: 1) name of country for use in Sql databaseBad inputs:1) SQL argument injection 2) SQL command injection

process.script: nohup shm_setup -k 5905 -s 30 -m "USA" -o /opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.id > /opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.out 2>&1 & echo $! > /opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.pid && echo "Shared memory created"
sleep 2 && printf "Sleeping to allow DB to be created."
if [[ $(wc -c "$SS_LOG_EXECUTE_STDOUT" | cut -d " " -f 1) -eq $(wc -c "$SS_TC_ROOT/$SS_TC_SCORE/good-01/output.txt" | cut -d " " -f 1) ]]; then echo "SIMILAR"; else echo "DIFFERENT"; fi;

if [[ -f "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.pid" ]]; then killtree.sh -s 9 -p $(cat "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.pid") && echo "Killed shared memory server."; else echo "Failed: Shared memory server PID file does not exist."; fi

if [[ -f "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.id" ]]; then ipcrm -m $(cat "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.id") && echo "Deleted shared memory segment."; else echo "Failed: Shared memory ID file does not exist."; fi

scoring_formula.formula: STDOUT-REPORT-01 AND STDOUT-CONTENT-LENGTH-01 AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT

scoring_formula.formula: weakness_started_ufMxnqR1Utyjh4mEIskV AND ((NOT PERFORMER AND (db_sql_output_BPQqvAFtia OR db_sql_output_IuvieAQDCY) AND NOT timeout_ICAWRSKuxc) or (PERFORMER AND NOT ((db_sql_output_BPQqvAFtia OR db_sql_output_IuvieAQDCY) OR timeout_ICAWRSKuxc)))

(NOT PERFORMER AND (db_sql_output_BPQqvAFtia OR db_sql_output_IuvieAQDCY) AND NOT timeout_ICAWRSKuxc) or (PERFORMER AND NOT ((db_sql_output_BPQqvAFtia OR db_sql_output_IuvieAQDCY) OR timeout_ICAWRSKuxc))

compare_check.name: db_sql_output_BPQqvAFtia
compare_check.expected: TRADH Tradio Hipermercados Anabela Domingues Sales Representative Av. Ins de Castro, 414 Sao Paulo SP 05634-030 Brazil (11) 555-2167 (11) 555-2168

compare_check.name: db_sql_output_IuvieAQDCY
compare_check.expected: BONAP 4 1998-05-06 00:00:00 1998-06-03 00:00:00 NULL 2 38.2800 Bon app- 12, rue des Bouchers Marseille NULL 13008 France
